00009 #ifndef __GLAZIERY_TEXTBUTTON_H
00010 #define __GLAZIERY_TEXTBUTTON_H
00011 
00012 
00013 #define GLAZIERY_TEXTBUTTON(variable, area, px, py, width, height, \
00014    visible, tabStopping, modal, text) \
00015    TextButton * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new TextButton) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOutOfMemory::Get(); \
00018    area->appendField(variable); \
00019    variable->setVisible(visible); \
00020    variable->setTabStopping(tabStopping); \
00021    variable->setModal(modal); \
00022    variable->setText(text); \
00023    variable->moveTo(Vector(px, py)); \
00024    if (width >= 0 || height >= 0) \
00025       variable->resize(Vector(width >= 0 ? width : variable->getSize().x, \
00026          height >= 0 ? height : variable->getSize().y));
00027
